main.name: Yucheng Lin
main.description: Interested in in-depth understanding of the industry and actually participating in the business. I want to seize the two-year master's time, participate in various corporate activities, and have the opportunity to go in the industry for internships !!
main.bio: Junior Web Developer / Blockchain Engineer Specialized in front end development and developing some DApp. Experienced with React library and I am keen on writing some smart contracts deployed on web projects. Well-versed in numerous programming languages including HTML5, java OOP, node.js, python. Passionate about learning new technology. My strength is equipped with good communication skills and have lots of teamwork experience. During the graduate school I keep learning more techniques about blockchain and k8s architecture.
main.contactmessage: 如果對我想了解更多，歡迎聯絡我!

work.title: smart contract developer
work.description: Startup case company launch NFT project for client, I am responsible for writing smart contracts and also responsible for negotiating the demand and definiteing the price

work.title: Digital Innovation Salon NCCU X IBM - Course Assistant
work.description: Discuss with IBM consultant about the course content and teaching style of last semester, and modify the course content of the new semester.

work.title: Artificial Intelligence and Expert System - Course Assistant
work.description: Responsible for correcting the students’ homework. Before everyone starts the final report, demonstrate an artificial intelligence program application. The program I demo using machine learning to predict the locations where new airbnb users may travel.

work.title: Python Programming Language - Course Assistant
work.description: Scoring the final report with teacher, And give students suggestions on how to extend the program. When students from different major have some problem give them enough assistance.

work.title: Department Office part-time worker
work.description: Acting as a graduate project consultant, listening to the reports of each group and giving suggestions. No matter what functions should be expanded to make the project more completed, or provided some business models for each group to reference.

certificate.name: Ethereum and Solidity: Complete Developer's Guide
Big Data and Data Science program

testimonials.text: 祐丞聰穎樂觀，他在擔任助教期間認真批改作業並主動幫助學弟妹解決課業上的問題，因為他態度積極也幫了老師很多的忙，相信他日後會有不錯的工作表現。
